column1: '''The Hobbit-forming World of J.R.R. Tolkien''' refers to the title of an article which includes extracts from an interview with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The interview was conducted by Henry Resnik over the telephone
column2: for the magazine the ''Saturday Evening Post'' (published in [[Saturday Evening Post (2 July 1966)|the issue of 2 July 1966]]). The interview was perhaps conducted on [[2 March]] [[1966]] and according to Resnik they spoke for about half an hour. According to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]
column3: Tolkien disliked the published article and had hung up on Resnik.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (2006)
column4: ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Chronology''

column1: A more complete transcription of the interview was published in [[Niekas 18|''Niekas'' Issue 18 (Late Spring 1967)]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography''
column2: at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>. The issue is readable [http://efanzines.com/Niekas/Niekas-18.pdf#37 online].
